files.patch:
@@ -589,0 +589,3 @@ + *

+ * Range of {@code InstantSeconds} is between {@link Instant#MIN} and {@link Instant#MAX} + * {@linkplain Instant#getEpochSecond() epoch second}, both inclusive. @@ -590,2 +593,1 @@ - // ValueRange matches the min and max epoch second supported by java.time.Instant - INSTANT_SECONDS("InstantSeconds", SECONDS, FOREVER, ValueRange.of(-31557014167219200L, 31556889864403199L)), + INSTANT_SECONDS("InstantSeconds", SECONDS, FOREVER, ValueRange.of(Instant.MIN.getEpochSecond(), Instant.MAX.getEpochSecond())),
